properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REFUND

SELECT REFUND_NO , REFUND_DATE , REFUND_COIN , BANK_ACCOUNT , BANK_NAME , ACCOUNT_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , RLIST.* FROM(SELECT REFUND_NO , REFUND_DATE , REFUND_COIN , BANK_ACCOUNT , BANK_NAME , ACCOUNT_NAME , USER_EMAIL , USER_NO FROM REFUND JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE COMPLETE_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY REFUND_NO) RLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE REFUND SET COMPLETE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE REFUND_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT USER_NO , USER_EMAIL , USER_PWD , NICKNAME , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , USER_TYPE , PROFILE_IMG , TARGET_HOUR , USER_COIN , REPORT_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , RLIST.* FROM(SELECT USER_NO , USER_EMAIL , USER_PWD , NICKNAME , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , USER_TYPE , PROFILE_IMG , TARGET_HOUR , USER_COIN , REPORT_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_TYPE, REPORT_COUNT DESC, USER_NO DESC) RLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_NO , USER_EMAIL , USER_PWD , NICKNAME , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , USER_TYPE , PROFILE_IMG , TARGET_HOUR , USER_COIN , REPORT_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , RLIST.* FROM(SELECT USER_NO , USER_EMAIL , USER_PWD , NICKNAME , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS , USER_TYPE , PROFILE_IMG , TARGET_HOUR , USER_COIN , REPORT_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND NICKNAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY USER_TYPE, REPORT_COUNT DESC, USER_NO DESC) RLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_TYPE = 'A' WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_TYPE = 'U' WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , S_DAY , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD , S_STARTTIME , S_ENDTIME , S_EXPLAIN , S_NOTICE , CNAME , NICKNAME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY M WHERE M.S_NO = S_NO) AS "studyMemberNum" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , RLIST.* FROM ( SELECT S.S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , S_DAY , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD , S_STARTTIME , S_ENDTIME , S_EXPLAIN , S_NOTICE , CNAME , NICKNAME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY M WHERE M.S_NO = S.S_NO) AS "studyMemberNum" FROM STUDY S JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.S_NO = S.S_NO JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY S_NO DESC) RLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , S_DAY , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD , S_STARTTIME , S_ENDTIME , S_EXPLAIN , S_NOTICE , CNAME , NICKNAME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY M WHERE M.S_NO = S_NO) AS "studyMemberNum" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , RLIST.* FROM ( SELECT S.S_NO , S_NAME , S_TO , S_DAY , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD , S_STARTTIME , S_ENDTIME , S_EXPLAIN , S_NOTICE , CNAME , NICKNAME , FILE_PATH , CHANGE_NAME , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOINSTUDY M WHERE M.S_NO = S.S_NO) AS "studyMemberNum" FROM STUDY S JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.S_NO = S.S_NO JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND S_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY S_NO DESC) RLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE STUDY SET S_STATUS = 'N' WHERE S_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT R JOIN BOARDREPORT BR ON (R.REPORT_NO = BR.REPORT_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON (BR.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT R JOIN REPLYREPORT RR ON (R.REPORT_NO = RR.REPORT_NO) JOIN REPLY RE ON (RR.REPLY_NO = RE.REPLY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (RE.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , USER_NO , RUSER_NO , RNICKNAME , SUBJECT , BR_NO , BOARD_NO , RCOUNT , ALLCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BLIST.* FROM(SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , RUSER_NO , M.NICKNAME "RNICKNAME" , NVL2('BR.BOARD_NO','게시판','NULL일경우 반환값') SUBJECT , BR.BOARD_NO "BR_NO" , BR.BOARD_NO , B.REPORT_COUNT RCOUNT , M.REPORT_COUNT ALLCOUNT FROM REPORT R JOIN BOARDREPORT BR ON (R.REPORT_NO = BR.REPORT_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON (BR.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC) BLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , USER_NO , RUSER_NO , RNICKNAME , SUBJECT , BR_NO , BOARD_NO , RCOUNT , ALLCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BLIST.* FROM(SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , RUSER_NO , M.NICKNAME "RNICKNAME" , NVL2('BR.BOARD_NO','게시판','NULL일경우 반환값') SUBJECT , BR.BOARD_NO "BR_NO" , BR.BOARD_NO , B.REPORT_COUNT RCOUNT , M.REPORT_COUNT ALLCOUNT FROM REPORT R JOIN BOARDREPORT BR ON (R.REPORT_NO = BR.REPORT_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON (BR.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RCOUNT DESC) BLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , USER_NO , RUSER_NO , RNICKNAME , SUBJECT , BR_NO , BOARD_NO , RCOUNT , ALLCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BLIST.* FROM(SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , RUSER_NO , M.NICKNAME "RNICKNAME" , NVL2('BR.BOARD_NO','게시판','NULL일경우 반환값') SUBJECT , BR.BOARD_NO "BR_NO" , BR.BOARD_NO , B.REPORT_COUNT RCOUNT , M.REPORT_COUNT ALLCOUNT FROM REPORT R JOIN BOARDREPORT BR ON (R.REPORT_NO = BR.REPORT_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON (BR.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ALLCOUNT DESC) BLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , USER_NO , RUSER_NO , RNICKNAME , SUBJECT , BR_NO , BOARD_NO , RCOUNT , ALLCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BLIST.* FROM( SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , RUSER_NO , M.NICKNAME "RNICKNAME" , NVL2('RE.BOARD_NO','댓글','NULL일경우 반환값') SUBJECT , RE.REPLY_NO "BR_NO" , RE.BOARD_NO , RE.REPORT_COUNT RCOUNT , M.REPORT_COUNT ALLCOUNT FROM REPORT R JOIN REPLYREPORT RR ON (R.REPORT_NO = RR.REPORT_NO) JOIN REPLY RE ON (RR.REPLY_NO = RE.REPLY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (RE.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC) BLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , USER_NO , RUSER_NO , RNICKNAME , SUBJECT , BR_NO , BOARD_NO , RCOUNT , ALLCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BLIST.* FROM( SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , RUSER_NO , M.NICKNAME "RNICKNAME" , NVL2('RE.BOARD_NO','댓글','NULL일경우 반환값') SUBJECT , RE.REPLY_NO "BR_NO" , RE.BOARD_NO , RE.REPORT_COUNT RCOUNT , M.REPORT_COUNT ALLCOUNT FROM REPORT R JOIN REPLYREPORT RR ON (R.REPORT_NO = RR.REPORT_NO) JOIN REPLY RE ON (RR.REPLY_NO = RE.REPLY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (RE.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RCOUNT DESC) BLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , USER_NO , RUSER_NO , RNICKNAME , SUBJECT , BR_NO , BOARD_NO , RCOUNT , ALLCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BLIST.* FROM( SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , RUSER_NO , M.NICKNAME "RNICKNAME" , NVL2('RE.BOARD_NO','댓글','NULL일경우 반환값') SUBJECT , RE.REPLY_NO "BR_NO" , RE.BOARD_NO , RE.REPORT_COUNT RCOUNT , M.REPORT_COUNT ALLCOUNT FROM REPORT R JOIN REPLYREPORT RR ON (R.REPORT_NO = RR.REPORT_NO) JOIN REPLY RE ON (RR.REPLY_NO = RE.REPLY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (RE.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ALLCOUNT DESC) BLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , M.NICKNAME , B.BOARD_TITLE , REPORT_CONTENT FROM BOARDREPORT BR JOIN REPORT R ON (BR.REPORT_NO = R.REPORT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON( BR.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE BR.BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , M.NICKNAME , RP.REPLY_CONTENT , REPORT_CONTENT FROM REPLYREPORT RR JOIN REPORT R ON (RR.REPORT_NO = R.REPORT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN REPLY RP ON (RR.REPLY_NO = RP.REPLY_NO) WHERE RR.REPLY_NO = ? ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , USER_NO , NICKNAME , REPLY_CONTENT , SUBJECT , REPORT_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BLIST.* FROM( SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , NICKNAME , REPLY_CONTENT , NVL2('RR.REPLY_NO','댓글','NULL일경우 반환값') SUBJECT , REPORT_CONTENT FROM REPORT R JOIN REPLYREPORT RR ON (R.REPORT_NO = RR.REPORT_NO) JOIN REPLY RP ON (RR.REPLY_NO = RP.REPLY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND RUSER_NO = ?
UNION
SELECT R.REPORT_NO , REPORT_DATE , R.USER_NO , NICKNAME , BOARD_TITLE , NVL2('BR.BOARD_NO','게시판','NULL일경우 반환값') SUBJECT , REPORT_CONTENT FROM REPORT R JOIN BOARDREPORT BR ON (R.REPORT_NO = BR.REPORT_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON (BR.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND RUSER_NO = ? ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC) BLIST)
